alert.note: Alert for Vernon (Wisconsin) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS LaCrosse (Southwestern Wisconsin, Southeastern Minnesota, and Northeast Iowa)
info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued May 14 at 6:55PM CDT by NWS LaCrosse
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm between New Albin and De Soto... At 653 PM CDT, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm near New Albin, or 12 miles north of Lansing, moving northeast at 40 mph. HAZARD...Wind gusts up to 50 mph and nickel size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Minor damage to outdoor objects is possible. This strong thunderstorm will be near... Coon Valley around 715 PM CDT. Viroqua around 720 PM CDT. Westby around 725 PM CDT. Other locations impacted by this storm include Esofea, Red Mound, Spring Ridge, Romance, Runge Hollow, Chaseburg, and Avalanche. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.88 IN MAX WIND GUST...50 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building.
